original_title: Vida i mort d un espai en tres actes
overview: This documentary  chronicles the final days of the Colony Castells, one of the few remaining factory colonies in Barcelona, which will be demolished in 2011. With the demolition of low houses and narrow streets, an entire relational microworld will be buried  with its peculiar and very human way of understanding the urban space, by its beloved inhabitants.
title: Vida i mort d un espai en tres actes
